title: Alpha Imaging Expands Shimadzu Territory
text:
RSS Navigation Links HOME >> MEDICINE >> TECHNOLOGY Alpha Imaging Expands Shimadzu Territory ... CLEVELAND Sept. 1 2015 /-&#16... Michigan is contiguous to our current terri...A regional distributor of diagnostic imaging equipment Alpha Imaging ... Shimadzu and Alpha Imaging have had a long successful partnership de... http://feeds.bio-medicine.org/latest-medical-technology Date:9/1/2015 
CLEVELAND , Sept. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Alpha Imaging LLC , a leading distributor of advanced medical imaging equipment based in Cleveland announced today that they have been awarded exclusive rights to represent the complete Shimadzu Medical Systems portfolio of X-ray imaging systems in Michigan. The new territory supplements Alpha Imaging's existing Shimadzu sales and service responsibilities with those in several other states including Ohio , Indiana , Pennsylvania , Kentucky , Maryland , West Virginia , Delaware and Virginia . 
" Michigan is contiguous to our current territory which will allow us to leverage our existing sales and service resources, while adding personnel to ultimately best service our customers," said Michael Perrico , CEO of Alpha Imaging. "There is a substantial installed base of Shimadzu equipment in Michigan and we are excited to support these great products and add prestigious clients to our growing customer base." 
A regional distributor of diagnostic imaging equipment, Alpha Imaging has represented Shimadzu Medical Systems since 1991 and maintains one of the largest territories of installed equipment for Shimadzu in the country. 
"Shimadzu and Alpha Imaging have had a long, successful partnership delivering advanced medical imaging solutions in the Midwest and Mid-Atlantic states," said Tom Kloetzly , Vice President, U.S. Sales & Marketing, Shimadzu Medical Systems USA.
